page.title: 20HIGH CROSS SCHOOL./CREDITS.
page.content: The{"Puller Memorial"}primary school was founded in 1866. The name comes from the local family of Giles-Puller who lived at Youngsbury in the C19th and were responsible for building the nearby church in 1856. It is still a very small school,employing only 2 full-time teachers and 1 part-timer. Most of the children come from the nearby village of Colliers End. Some of the secondary school age children of High Cross travel to school in Ware and a number of these attend Presdales School. { {Presdales would like take this {opportunity to thank all the pupils {and staff who have contributed to the {Domesday Project and all the members {of the public who so kindly answered {our questions. }
